verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:23
verses.text: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived, and bare a son, and he called his name Beriah, because it went evil with his house.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:24
verses.text: (And his daughter was Sherah, who built Beth–horon the nether, and the upper, and Uzzen–sherah.)

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:25
verses.text: And Rephah was his son, also Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:26
verses.text: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:27
verses.text: Non his son, Jehoshua his son.
